qas.question: The first road connected Atlantic City to which mainland town?
The first road that connected Atlantic City to the mainland was completed in what year?
How much of a toll was charged on the first road to connect Atlantic City to the mainland?
What was the name of the first road to the mainland that did not charge a toll?

context: The first road connecting the city to the mainland at <a0_0>Pleasantville<a0_0/> was completed in <a1_0>1870<a1_0/> and charged a <a2_0>30-cent<a2_0/> toll. <a3_0>Albany Avenue<a3_0/> was the first road to the mainland that was available without a toll.
